website_summaries.verdict: This versatile chronograph watch is rugged enough for everyday wear yet stylish for occasions that require more than casual attire.
pros: 3 sub dials, safety bar, and stopwatch
Silver-tone with blue accents goes with casual or dressy attire
cons: Some men may find that it feels a bit heavy on the wrist
Rare reports of issues with the second hand being a bit "off

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch. Would love it more with a smooth sweep second hand.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Bulova and I can't really say anything negative about it. It wears well on my 7.5" wrist and receives many compliments from watch lovers and non-watch people alike. The blue dial is beautiful, as is the steel bracelet with secured deployant clasp. The reason for The 4-star review is mainly due to the lack of a smooth sweep second hand as is present on the Precisionist line with the same movement. I'd Bay weren't lacking, this would be a 5-star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse deals is the way to go! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an Amazon warehouse deal for $216...which is about 40 less than the other vendors. The description said that the watch was used. To my pleasure, I got a brand new watch, still in original packaging! The watch is a beautiful piece! I think for the price if you're into watches this needs to be a part of your collection! 100% satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bigred25929

customer_reviews.title: This watch is big and beautiful with a rich blue face and really nice details
customer_reviews.text: Bulova seems to have found a niche between more modest watches and much more expensive watches. This watch is big and beautiful with a rich blue face and really nice details. I may need to find a YouTube video to figure out the buttons and functions (our maybe I'll just forget all that and enjoy the watch). Very nice. My new "go to" watch for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: great feel and looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son. He absolutely loves it! Very high quality, great feel and looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Beiser

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty high quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Keeps very accurate time. I’ve already banged it against several surfaces by accident, and the face has not scratched at all. Just seems like a nice quality watch for the price. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Haywood Jablomi

customer_reviews.title: My first Bulova watch is a Marine Star 🌟
customer_reviews.text: My first Bulova watch and I love it. Got it for lower price then it went up. Bracelet get scratched easily but the crystal does not get scratched so far.
customer_reviews.author: X0l4nD34

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch and best deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch and best deal, I just saw the exact watch in a retail store for 435.00, good job shouting value guys!
customer_reviews.author: Rouzbeh Salehinia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Genuine
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Bulova, paid Macy's to size it. Perfect condition, we bought the blue face which came in a nice Bulova watch box with tags and protective plastic film over the glass. Very nice! Arrived on time but could have been better packed for the price and given it was jewelry/watch, it was just the watch box loose in an Amazon box with a few other small items we ordered. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good looking watch to wear. Easy to set and use. I especially like the fact that the bezel actually moves (other citizen and seiko ones do not), and the fact that there is not ugly Tachymeter like other watches have. Only thing I don't like so much (but which I got used to) was the fact that the second hand does not move unless you are timing something. There is a small sweep second hand if you just need to watch something spin around.
customer_reviews.author: MPEN

customer_reviews.title: Best price by far on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fits very large wrist. Blue dial is awesome and easy to read. Don’t buy in the island shops as their prices start at 292.00. Very well packed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my husband at a local jewery store then found the exact same watch for a much better price at Amazon as soon as left the store. Returned the first one. Very happy with the one from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnohara

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriends birthday and he absolutely loves it! It glows in the dark. He had nothing bad to say about it and the blue is just stunning. The picture really doesn't show it's justice for how beautiful this watch is.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch for an unbelievable price. For those worried about authenticity I simply called Bulova customer service and read them the case back number/ serial number and they verified it was their product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Money - Bulova Shines
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this watch in particular is solid, with solid materials and build quality. Bulova has watches up to 10K+ and are able to transfer this build quality into their entry level watches. I am on Chrono24 and have my watches monitored for value and this watch is already up 35% from when I purchased it a few weeks ago. This and the Bulova Moon watches are the ones to watch. The Moon watch was highly reviewed (I bought that as well - strap and SS bracelet). Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but better on the photo
customer_reviews.text: Online photo is great. Actual watch appeared underwhelming to me. That is a personal impression. Amazon’s return policy makes this a non-issue. Great place to shop for watches
customer_reviews.author: DragonLake

customer_reviews.title: It last 3 months 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all I got it in December and it worked for 3 month and it didn’t work any more then I change the battery and it didn’t work now there is no way to get in contact with the seller
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P.

customer_reviews.title: Bulova has a winner with this Men's Chronograph
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a replacement for an Invicta Chronograph that is no longer working. This watch is lighter than expected, looks great with any wardrobe choice and is accurate down to the minute. If you are looking for a dependable Men's watch, the Bulova line of chronographs are worth reviewing.
customer_reviews.author: Max200037

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Easily scratched, loose 0-60 scale
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. Only 2 take backs from this are that the finish scratches a little easier than I expected. The other being that the crown that spins the 0-60 scale under the bezel tends to have too much play as it may move if its rubbed even the slightest(the bezel itself does not move). This may not bother most but I'm a little obsessive for straight lines. But over all I do enjoy wearing the watch.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but will stop working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: The surface scratches easily and it is much lighter than my other Bulova. It is so much lighter that it feels fake. The watch has completely lost accuracy after 5 months, which is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas Kashyap

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look of this quality time piece. Looks and feels great on my wrist. Highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: ... collection of chronographs and this is one of the best as are a couple of other Bulova models
customer_reviews.text: I own a small collection of chronographs and this is one of the best as are a couple of other Bulova models.
customer_reviews.author: Appleknocker

customer_reviews.title: Quality watch for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch! My grandfather was a watch maker and he swore by Bulova saying, for the money, they make the best watches. The band seems a little cheap and after I had some links taken out it squeaks but nothing a little oil can't fix. If anything, i'll slap on a polyurethane band eventually. Definitely will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lendoiro

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it! It was gift for our 2 year anniversary. His friends loved it too. Watch is well crafted, good weight, and looks nice with any outfit. Shipping was excellent! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Tells proper time but not date
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels great. It has a good weight to it. Only issue I have with mine is after adjusting the date on the watch, after a few days it will start to be off and over time the date will be behind for a few days/week if not readjusted. In the photo I took, the watch says 13th but today is the 21st. I should state that the last time I adjusted the date was back in September/October
customer_reviews.author: Kay Pii

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves this watch. Great color, accurate, and the hands do have a glow function to them. Saved money buying it from here for the exact same watch.
customer_reviews.author: Feffer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty but Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The button. You use to wind the watch digs into my wrist when I hold my hand up.. Beautiful watch but not ergonomically made.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice form, Handsome watch!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice watch. Watch band is not so great however. Latch on bottom does not remain flush with rest of band. Otherwise we're very happy for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Great, but didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my fiancè for Christmas because I saw him eyeing it in a store at the mall. The mall price was over $400, and here it was $200. The watch came in and it was absolutely beautiful and new. The only thing that really sucked was that it wasn't working, which of course wouldn't be that big of a deal if my fiancé only used his watch for style. But he was disappointed that it didn't work, which is why I gave the four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi D

customer_reviews.title: i collect watches and just bought this watch recently love the built in bezel hands and date can be ...
customer_reviews.text: i collect watches and just bought this watch recently love the built in bezel hands and date can be read at a glance keeps great time already received many complements great chronograph watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch for a great price. Fast service
customer_reviews.author: Keith Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is good looking and great quality. The band was long enough for my large wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: I initially saw this watch in a jewelry store for $365.  The Amazon price was quite a savings.
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch and was impressed. The face is bright with great detail for the price range. Adjusting the band was simple and straight forward. It has already gotten some compliments from a couple of my watch savvy friends. And the Wife likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not a HAQ movement watch. For the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a HAQ movement watch. For the price, I think Bulova should have gone the extra mile. However, it is a stylish and functional chronometer. The aqua-colored glow-in-the-dark hands and face are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tom R.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a digital movement guy. This thing keeps time very well. I love knowing that the time on my wrist is really , truly, the time. My last one lost, maybe 1 second a month.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and time accurate. Thing I do not like is that I can't crew tight the time adjustment button.
customer_reviews.author: Sinh V Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive. More bang for my buck. Great quality and great expensive look at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This a great all around watch. Classy and practical. Very nicely weighted. Looks better in person than in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bulova Still Has It
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Can’t stop staring at it. Be warned I have large wrists and had to take out a link. If you have small to medium size wrists, you will absolutely have to remove some links. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big watch
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. Nice watch but I found it a bit too big for me on a 71⁄4" wrist, I don't mind a big watch but I didn't feel comfortable with it. Usual Bulova quality and timekeeping though.
customer_reviews.author: Skunge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best looking watches I've ever seen!! It's way more beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.author: Brock S.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive but a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: A really beautiful watch but a bit heavy and thick. The blue color face is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: DiverBob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, beautiful watch. It looks and feels like a well made watch, it has some weight(not too heavy though). I have wrists that are kind of large and it was a perfect fit right out of the box. I think I made the right choice by adding this to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Complete fake. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a fake. As soon as I took it out of the box it feels like a cheap reproduction. Used the stop watch once for 5 seconds and the hands never reset to zero, they came close but not correct. Bulova doesn't send extra links connected, the extra links and pins should be in a small bag inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks nice and keeps time well, but the metal scratches way too easily. I’m guessing they used a cheaper grade of stainless steel, as I’ve never had another watch get scratched up as quickly or badly as this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Elegantly stylish
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband's birthday. It is very stylish. The only thing it did not come with instructions on moving the bezel. We had to Google it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with this watch for our 10 year anniversary. He likes a large watch, and it’s the same quality you would expect for Bulova. I would definitely purchase this watch again. Fast shipping, great price, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this Watch!! It was too heavy for me, but maybe it is normal to be lime that in men watches.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but be aware
customer_reviews.text: Loved this watch when I got it but after 2 years the glo in the dark aspect has diminished to nothing
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Standard Bulova. Even banged the crystal a couple times and no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hine

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and keeps great time. Good for casual or formal nights.
customer_reviews.author: Aviator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It is a excellent watch. Good weight, well built and the perfect Size.
customer_reviews.author: Eder

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this watch. It's a heavy, well made, beautiful men's watch. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Correct weight for me. Easy to see. Accurate. Package seemed worn out. Or old
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking watch. Stunning blue color, bold and elegant. Best price out there!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch for a graduation gift for my nephew. When it came in we looked at it and I thought I'd keep it for myself. My nephew loved it and can't wait to wear it for his brothers wedding. And yes I will be getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: todd deblois

customer_reviews.title: It's a lovely watch but too large so I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely watch but too large so I returned it. I'm looking for a timepiece, not a fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: patiara

customer_reviews.title: Incredible beauty for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome! So glad I spend a few more dollars and purchased this watch. It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great looking too!
customer_reviews.text: I have received complements already. I have only worn it 3 times. High quality as you would expect from a name like Bulova.
customer_reviews.author: John OD

customer_reviews.title: Keeps time looks awesome but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Second hand doesn’t tick and battery seal/gasket is hanging out of the compartment on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Solid Watch
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid watch. Love the size and look of it. Only thing I don't like is the clasp. This has a pushbutton deployment clasp rather than the butterfly clasp my other Bulova has. Other than that, great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible price for a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: A price that cannot be beat, beautiful piece, I really love it. I called Bulova customer service and authenticated the serial number, so it's original and authentic. Super happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: AndresV

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my new watch. When I received it I was very happy since it looked better than I expected. Kudo's to Bulova!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch, looks great. My Daughter bought it for her husband & he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe   Marine

customer_reviews.title: No lap feature
customer_reviews.text: The chronograph does not have a lap feature. It’s either stop or start, and reset of course
customer_reviews.author: Marc Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. I have had it for the last 2 weeks and is keeping time. Looks high quality and so far I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neal B.

customer_reviews.title: I find it an exaggeration.
customer_reviews.text: I find it an exaggeration as the price rose from one day to another from $ 198 to $ 337. it is too expensive. more in the situation we are in, as to put the price so high. I seem to take advantage of the buyers in the middle of the covid-19.
customer_reviews.author: jose venegas moreira

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Perfect function. Looks more expensive that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected. Excellent service and a wonderful product. All aces!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES CUBA

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking at it for a while. Waited till pricing was right.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, excellent price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My finance loved the watch, he loved the design and fit well! Nice vaule for your buck!!! 👍💯💯💯🔗
customer_reviews.author: Mere Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, bills quality on the band could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, but the build quality on the band could be better
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Coggeshall

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Well built watch. Sharp looking. Perfect size head. Two tone band looks amazing. Just what I was hoping for but better.
customer_reviews.author: Lokemire

customer_reviews.title: Bulova Marine Star Blue Dial - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, one of my favorites watches. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomás Grimaldo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Band feels cheaper than my previous Bulova's but still a very nice watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jason p.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as the groom's gift! He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It's an elegant and practical time piece for a long time to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color on the face and the whole watch looks sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful watch and elegant watch, better than in the photo. One of my best purchases here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS WATCH FOR MY HUSBANT BIRTHDAY. I HOPE THAT HE WILL LIKE IT TOO
customer_reviews.author: CHARIKLEIA MANTANIKA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Great buy. Highly recommend the brand. It'll last a lifetime if taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! It's little big on my wrist. Need to resize it.
customer_reviews.author: Muhib

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch love it....Great price for a very nice watch...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Black

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, have had no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, have had no problems with it. I have had a lot of compliments about this watch. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, nice weight and looks good. I have several Bulova watches and like them all
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch looks great and was a good price
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great and was a good price. It arrived on time and no issue with shipping. So far it seems to keep accurate time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Watch, good quality but nota excellent! O recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ángel Galvis

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. It looks exactly as it is shown in the pictures. No issues upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp and well made watch. I get tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It is even more beautiful in person than in the picture shown
customer_reviews.text: It is even more beautiful in person than in the picture shown! You can see that it is high quality, and is truely is a great gift for yourself or a loved one. My boyfriend and I were extremely impressed, expecially at such a wonderful deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Looks awesome and face is amazing
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Looks awesome and face is amazing. There are additional links, which makes this great for different size wrists and growth.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I had to figure out resizing
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. It’s a little big on my wrist so I would need to resize it. Amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: chicago man

customer_reviews.title: a reasonably good one that matches your style is the most important
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and changed the band with the silicone navy blue band (from ton charme,10 bucks) and it becomes a day to day watch. Much lighter now. A very fair price for an elegant watch. when you buy for an everyday use watch, the price does not matter, a reasonably good one that matches your style is the most important. $6000 or $60K does not count here. Also, if you traveling with a private jet a$60K watch is a must, but walking in a hustle bustle crowded city and you do not want to lose your $60 k .
customer_reviews.author: Padetha Tin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it was carved from Mt. Vesuvius by Zeus himself. This watch is the tits!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it's even better than in the picture. The delivery was fine too, no trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The real one when receiving look better than picture in amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nga socola

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Safe yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy, substandard and very much NOT what I'd expect of a watch for that price. #1 was great for 3 weeks, then the stopwatch second hand decided it'd home itself 2s off true, and the 100ths counter did the same thing. Ordered a return/replace which Amazing handled *excellently* only to find that #2 had the identical problem with the stopwatch second hand. Very poorly done, Bulova. Lousy quality control and equally lousy engineering.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK L SALMON

customer_reviews.title: WOW is what everyone says. 👍
customer_reviews.text: WOW. This watch looks so good... all I get is compliments on this everywhere I go. It is the perfect size the face is not at all small and is not overly large. The watch is very well designed and built strong. It is thick and feels very robust. I like it so much I may order the white face one as well.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Watch bezel offset
customer_reviews.text: Outside bezel doesn't line up appropriately with inside hour dashes. For instance the downward arrow on top is slightly to the left of the 12 o'clock dash. Seems to be an issue with this watch in general since I purchased this in store originally, had the issue but even worse, returned, this one has the same issue. Sucks amazon would even send it out though
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch too thick and awkwardly big lacks the sophistication of Bulawayo watches I'm familiar with.
customer_reviews.author: benaud

customer_reviews.title: Order time in time waiting the next step how it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Order time in time waiting the next step how it's working
customer_reviews.author: Pierre M.

product_meta.title: Bulova Marine Star - 96B256
product_meta.description:
* Bulova Marine Star 
 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Add a new depth to your look with the Marine Star Bulova® timepiece.
 * Stainless steel case.
 * Silver-tone stainless steel bracelet features a double-press deployant closure.
 * Round face.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Blue dial features silver-tone hands and hour markers, three subdials, minute track, date display window, and Bulova detailing.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Water resistant 100m.
 * Imported.
 * Your Bulova watch is covered by Bulova's 3-Year Global Warranty.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 44 mm
    *  Case Width: 44 mm
    *  Case Depth: 12 mm
    *  Band Width: 19 13⁄16 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 8 in
    *  Weight: 6.4 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.5 x 4.1 x 3.7 inches; 15.87 Ounces
 * Item model number :96B256
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 18, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Bulova Corporation
 * ASIN :B01AJF1KLS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #574,532 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #4557 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #186001 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars410 ratings

 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Add a new depth to your look with the Marine Star Bulova® timepiece.
 * Stainless steel case.
 * Silver-tone stainless steel bracelet features a double-press deployant closure.
 * Round face.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Blue dial features silver-tone hands and hour markers, three subdials, minute track, date display window, and Bulova detailing.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Water resistant 100m.

feature_bullets: The inner bezel ring rotates by using the crown at 10 o’clock, and position the marks on the ring to align with any markings on the dial
43 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window,Case Thickness: 12.2 mm
Quartz movement with analog display. It is necessary to unscrew the crown before setting the watch and re-screw the crowns afterwards
Stainless steel band with fold-over clasp. Set the hands on time by turning the crown
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving;

Note: When the crown is in the “OUT” position, the motor and hands stop. Only the quartz crystal continues to vibrate, using very little power. If the watch is to be stored for a length of time, it is recommended that the crown be left in the “OUT” position to prolong battery life.
